# Nested Lists Document

## Deep Nesting

- Level 1 item 1
  - Level 2 item 1.1
    - Level 3 item 1.1.1
    - Level 3 item 1.1.2
  - Level 2 item 1.2
- Level 1 item 2
  - Level 2 item 2.1

## Mixed List Types

1. First ordered item
   - Unordered nested item
   - Another unordered nested item
2. Second ordered item
   1. Ordered nested item
   2. Another ordered nested item
3. Third ordered item

- [ ] Incomplete task
